price: 48. Y si se les dice que (recen y) se inclinen ante Al-lah, no lo hacen.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
